description.value:
The sheer force of your faith can bring a foe crashing down.

If the next action you use is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Harm]{Harm} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} to damage one creature, the target is knocked prone if it takes any damage from the spell. If the target critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.
